src:
a los 60 años
Muere Brian Tarantina, actor de 'La maravillosa Sra. Maisel'
El intérprete también había participado en series como 'Las chicas Gilmore' y 'Ley y orden'
04 Nov 2019, 09:04 by El Periódico
El Gaslight, el local en el que se ambienta la serie 'La maravillosa Sra. Maisel', ha perdido a su propietario. El actor Brian Tarantina, que daba vida al dueño del club nocturno en el que se dio a conocer la protagonista de la serie de Amazon Prime Video, ha muerto en Nueva York a los 60 años.
Aunque la cadena WCBS-TV ha confirmado que su cuerpo había sido encontrado sin vida en su apartamento de Hell's Kitchen, se desconocen todavía las causas de su muerte.
Homenaje
La cuenta de Twitter de 'La maravillosa Sra. Maisel' ha querido rendir homenaje al actor: "El Gaslight no volverá a ser lo mismo sin ti. Gracias Brian por compartir todas las risas. Todo el amor a su familia y amigos en este momento difícil", han escrito.



Aparte de su participación en la serie galardonada con el Emmy y el Globo a la mejor comedia, la amplia filmografía de Tarantina cuenta con casi 90 producciones, entre las que figuran series como 'Las chicas Gilmore', 'Ley y orden', 'Corrupción en Miami', 'Oz', 'Héroes', 'Elementary' y 'Person of interest'.

text:
at 60
Brian Tarantina, actor of 'The Wonderful Mrs. Maisel' dies
The interpreter had also participated in series such as 'Gilmore Girls' and 'Law and Order'
04 Nov 2019, 09:04 by El Periódico
The Gaslight, the place where the series 'The wonderful Mrs. Maisel' is set, has lost its owner. Actor Brian Tarantina, who gave life to the owner of the nightclub in which the protagonist of the Amazon Prime Video series was announced, has died in New York at age 60.
Although the WCBS-TV network has confirmed that his body had been found lifeless in his apartment at Hell's Kitchen, the causes of his death are still unknown.
Tribute
The Twitter account of 'The wonderful Mrs. Maisel' wanted to pay tribute to the actor: "The Gaslight will never be the same without you. Thank you Brian for sharing all the laughs. All the love to his family and friends at this time difficult, "they wrote.



Apart from his participation in the Emmy and the Globe award-winning series for best comedy, Tarantina's extensive filmography features almost 90 productions, including series such as' Gilmore Girls', 'Law and Order', 'Corruption in Miami ',' Oz ',' Heroes', 'Elementary' and 'Person of interest'.
